org.apache.flink.runtime.state

类 DefaultOperatorStateBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.DefaultOperatorStateBackend
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, OperatorStateStore, OperatorStateBackend, Snapshotable<OperatorStateHandle>

    @Internal
public class DefaultOperatorStateBackend
extends java.lang.Object
implements OperatorStateBackend
    Default implementation of OperatorStateStore that provides the ability to make snapshots.

      • restoredStateMetaInfos

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RegisteredOperatorBackendStateMetaInfo.Snapshot<?>> restoredStateMetaInfos
        Map of state names to their corresponding restored state meta info.

        TODO this map can be removed when eager-state registration is in place. TODO we currently need this cached to check state migration strategies when new serializers are registered.

      • accessedStatesByName

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,DefaultOperatorStateBackend.PartitionableListState<?>> accessedStatesByName
        Cache of already accessed states.

        In contrast to registeredStates and restoredStateMetaInfos which may be repopulated with restored state, this map is always empty at the beginning.

        TODO this map should be moved to a base class once we have proper hierarchy for the operator state backends.

        另请参阅:
        FLINK-6849

      • getListState

        public <S> ListState<S> getListState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: OperatorStateStore
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore).

        Note the semantic differences between an operator list state and a keyed list state (see KeyedStateStore.getListState(ListStateDescriptor)). Under the context of operator state, the list is a collection of state items that are independent from each other and eligible for redistribution across operator instances in case of changed operator parallelism. In other words, these state items are the finest granularity at which non-keyed state can be redistributed, and should not be correlated with each other.

        The redistribution scheme of this list state upon operator rescaling is a round-robin pattern, such that the logical whole state (a concatenation of all the lists of state elements previously managed by each operator before the restore) is evenly divided into as many sublists as there are parallel operators.

        指定者:
        getListState 在接口中 OperatorStateStore
        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getUnionListState

        public <S> ListState<S> getUnionListState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: OperatorStateStore
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore).

        Note the semantic differences between an operator list state and a keyed list state (see KeyedStateStore.getListState(ListStateDescriptor)). Under the context of operator state, the list is a collection of state items that are independent from each other and eligible for redistribution across operator instances in case of changed operator parallelism. In other words, these state items are the finest granularity at which non-keyed state can be redistributed, and should not be correlated with each other.

        The redistribution scheme of this list state upon operator rescaling is a broadcast pattern, such that the logical whole state (a concatenation of all the lists of state elements previously managed by each operator before the restore) is restored to all parallel operators so that each of them will get the union of all state items before the restore.

        指定者:
        getUnionListState 在接口中 OperatorStateStore
        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getOperatorState

        @Deprecated
public <S> ListState<S> getOperatorState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 This was deprecated as part of a refinement to the function names. Please use getListState(ListStateDescriptor) instead.
        从接口复制的说明: OperatorStateStore
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore). The items in the list are repartitionable by the system in case of changed operator parallelism.
        指定者:
        getOperatorState 在接口中 OperatorStateStore
        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSerializableListState

        @Deprecated
public <T extends java.io.Serializable> ListState<T> getSerializableListState(java.lang.String stateName)
                                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 Using Java serialization for persisting state is not encouraged. Please use getListState(ListStateDescriptor) instead.
        从接口复制的说明: OperatorStateStore
        Creates a state of the given name that uses Java serialization to persist the state. The items in the list are repartitionable by the system in case of changed operator parallelism.

        This is a simple convenience method. For more flexibility on how state serialization should happen, use the OperatorStateStore.getListState(ListStateDescriptor) method.

        指定者:
        getSerializableListState 在接口中 OperatorStateStore
        参数:
        stateName - The name of state to create
        返回:
        A list state using Java serialization to serialize state objects.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • snapshot

        public java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<OperatorStateHandle> snapshot(long checkpointId,
                                                                         long timestamp,
                                                                         CheckpointStreamFactory streamFactory,
                                                                         CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: Snapshotable
        Operation that writes a snapshot into a stream that is provided by the given CheckpointStreamFactory and returns a @RunnableFuture that gives a state handle to the snapshot. It is up to the implementation if the operation is performed synchronous or asynchronous. In the later case, the returned Runnable must be executed first before obtaining the handle.
        指定者:
        snapshot 在接口中 Snapshotable<OperatorStateHandle>
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        streamFactory - The factory that we can use for writing our state to streams.
        checkpointOptions - Options for how to perform this checkpoint.
        返回:
        A runnable future that will yield a StateObject.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • restore

        public void restore(java.util.Collection<OperatorStateHandle> restoreSnapshots)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: Snapshotable
        Restores state that was previously snapshotted from the provided parameters. Typically the parameters are state handles from which the old state is read.
        指定者:
        restore 在接口中 Snapshotable<OperatorStateHandle>
        参数:
        restoreSnapshots - the old state to restore.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
